title: The One-Hour Freelancer
teaser: For people looking for work, online services can connect them with freelance jobs. But there's a catch: the job may last only an hour.
contentencoded:
If you can’t find the work you want in your hometown, it’s increasingly easy to find it in another city or state, and you don’t even have to move. There’s a catch though: the job may last only an hour.

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, David Molpus of WCPN reports that the “on-demand” economy is a growing trend that is reshaping careers and companies.
